name: Best BALL Scoops - Blast of Triple Toy Town
name_original: Best BALL Scoops - Blast of Triple Toy Town
description:
It is easy to play, but truly addictive.

Best BALL Scoops is a Zuma-like (marble shoot out, match 3) game .

Your goal is to clear all the marbles before they reach the end of the path, and meanwhile, achieve Combos, Chains and Gaps as many as possible to get the highest score.
